pageProduct.name: Thankyou Soothing Body Bar with Oat Milk 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SOOTHING - This plant-based body bar was made to love your skin! We've packed this guy full of organic Australian oat milk to cleanse and soothe, and olive oil to leave your body feeling calm and hydrated! The best part? This bar exists to help end global poverty. MADE WITH LOVE IN AUSTRALIA VEGAN FRIENDLY NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS MADE WITH NO PRODUCT WASTAGE MADE WITH RECYCLED CARDBOARD MADE WITH RECIRCULATED WATER

Warnings

But first, read this Patch test before use. Store below 25°C and in a clean dry place. Keep out of direct sunlight and pooled water. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes. If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue.

Common Uses

Soap Bar

Ingredients

Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Glycerin, Olive Fruit Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Shea Butter (Organic), Oatmeal Extract (Organic), Oat Milk (Organic), Vitamin E, Kaolin, Sodium Chloride, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate.

Directions

The how-to Massage the body bar over your wet skin to create a lather. Rinse off and pat dry.
